availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward H. Parrish (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, clerk, merchant, and city councilman.)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, clerk, merchant, and city councilman. Kentucky native. Married to Laura Poindexter Parrish in Fayette County on March 3, 1858. Father of William Parrish and Anna Parish. Clerk in Lexington in 1860. Merchant in Lexington in 1863. Member of the Lexington City Council in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 4, p. 516.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 4, p. 324B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Fayette County, KY, July 1863, p. 41.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994033, Fayette County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994033, Fayette County Marriages.
"E H Parrish (1836-1874)," Find A Grave, Memorial 97953098, accessed December 5, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/97953098.
